column1: DISCLAIMER: This report does not constitute legal or tax advice.

Abra makes no guarantees regarding the accuracy of this report and will not offer advice for your specific tax circumstances as laws and regulations change frequently and vary from country to country.
By using this report you disclaim Abra from any responsibility for the accuracy or adequacy of any positions taken by you in your tax reporting obligations. Please consult a professional tax advisor.
If you have multiple Abra wallets you will need to request reports for each wallet separately. Contact support@abra.com if you need help.
Transactions with implicit exchange currency conversions are split into multiple rows.
Your home currency is derived based on your provided phone number.
Please note there may be small rounding errors.
